meanings.definition: The quality or state of being excessively sentimental or emotional.
meanings.sent1: Her mawkishnesses made her cry at every sad movie.
meanings.sent2: The mawkishnesses in his speech moved the audience to tears.
meanings.sent3: The mawkishnesses in the love letter made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: His mawkishnesses were like a tidal wave of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The mawkishnesses of the poem lingered long after it was read.

meanings.definition: An excessive display of sentimentality or emotion.
meanings.sent1: The movie's mawkishnesses were too much for some viewers.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't handle the mawkishnesses of the romantic gesture.
meanings.sent3: The mawkishnesses of the play felt over-the-top but endearing.
meanings.sent4: The mawkishnesses of the farewell scene were like a storm of feelings.
meanings.sent5: His mawkishnesses were like a bright neon sign, impossible to miss.
